title: Pavilion House / The Architecture Company (TAC)
description: "We want a modern oasis to retire to with our little boys on the weekends" was a brief given to us by our clients who are busy medical professionals with a very hectic life in the city. The couple wished to cherish and recreate their favourite moments from their many travels and immortalize them within their new home.

title: Blok House / Quinzhee Architecture
description: Blok is a rustic retreat ideally located at the top of a natural climbing wall in the heart of Mount Le Maelstrom in Lac-Beauport, offering a perfect refuge for climbers.
